Title: Floods, wildfires top costliest climate-related disasters in 2025
Summary: Floods, wildfires top costliest climate-related disasters in 2025 . Relief and development charity organisation, Christian Aid, reveals that floods and wildfires are among 2025’s costliest . disasters .

Title: Airfares hike: NCAA tackles Air Peace boss, rejects tax claim
Summary: Nigerian Civil Aviation Authority has dismissed claims that domestic airfares are inflated due to multiple taxes . Director of Public Affairs and Consumer Protection Michael Achimugu said allegations of excessive taxes by the government on domestic flights are unfounded . He added that while the NCAA does not regulate fares, it had invited all domestic airlines to clarify the matter .

Title: World came too late in Nigeria’s terror fight — Ogun PDP Chieftain
Summary: Segun Sowunmi spoke on Channels Television’s Sunday Politics while reacting to recent United States airstrikes against militant groups in north-western Nigeria . He described the situation as painful for Nigerians, likening the killing of terrorists to watching wayward children being lost .

Title: ICYMI: How I was abducted, beaten, stripped in Benin — Obaseki’s cousin
Summary: Don Pedro Obaseki has narrated how he was allegedly abducted, beaten and stripped by suspected assailants in Benin City, Edo State . He spoke in a video shared by Africa Independent Television on Sunday, after PUNCH Online reported that suspected thugs had stripped him naked and taken him to the Oba of Benin’s Palace

Title: Obaseki fumes as suspected political thugs strip cousin naked
Summary: Suspected political thugs stripped the Chief Executive Officer of Hosamudia Farm, Don Pedro Obaseki, naked in Benin City, the Edo State capital . Title: Account for N50bn Bodija intervention funds now, Oyo ADC tells Makinde
Summary: Oyo State chapter of African Democratic Congress has called on Governor Seyi Makinde to account for the N50 billion intervention funds reportedly requested from the Federal Government following the January 2024 Bodija explosion .
